frameDefinitions: An Entity began its existence in the context of a Origin, which can be a place,  culture, time period, text, etc.
This frame contains  words for individuals, i.e. humans, with respect to their Origin.
An Entity began its existence in the context of a location of Origin, which is a discourse-salient place, or culture.

A Communicator processes some information (either from textual or real-world/perceptual sources) regarding a State_of_affairs into a concise form (a summary) that contains the essential content in briefer form, and communicates this summary to an Addressee, or records it in a Medium.
A System is perceived as complex depending on the intricacy of the interconnectivty of its parts or components.
The LUs in this frame refer to biological entities other than human beings and plants, which are labeled by the FE Animal.  ''  'My husband and I adopted a really sweet dog last year.'
frameExamples: The Christian <t>origin</t> of this quote is from Isaiah 22.
Obviously there are species that are <t>native</t> to China or used in Chinese Medicine that aren't used in Western or Cherokee Medicine and vice versa.
Frank has already <t>summarized</t> some of the reactions on his weblog.
San Diego freeways are a <t>complex</t> array of poorly maintained roads.
My husband and I adopted a really sweet dog last year.
listRoleDefinitions: The item whose <fen>Origin</fen> is under discussion.
The place or culture where the <fen>Entity</fen> was produced.

The <fen>Origin</fen> is the place where the <fen>Person</fen> was born or lived a salient part of her or his life.  In this frame, it is generally incorporated in the lexical item, but may be separately specified as in the following:
The <fen>Person</fen> is the human being whose <fen>Origin</fen> is specified.
The item whose <fen>Origin</fen> is under discussion.
The discourse-salient place or culture where the <fen>Entity</fen> was produced.
The <fen>Communicator</fen> creates and communicates the summary of the Information.
The textual or other <fen>Medium</fen> through which the <fen>Communicator</fen> summarizes.
The time at which the <fen>Communicator</fen> makes the <fen>Summary</fen>.
The complete entity or system whose complexity is under consideration.
The living organism belonging to the kingdom Animalia.
listRoleExamples: Foreigners <fex>from Japan</fex> get short shrift around here.
Did you see that <fex>bird</fex> in the tree?
